title: So like, does Diana not get a blood moon skin because Riot thinks its funny or something?
body: Seriously, Why does Diana not get one? She fights for the moon, so ya know, it would kinda make sense.

replies.body:
She is currently having a FIRE THEMED skin made because of the Fire vs Ice All-Stars tournament So just wait. She'll have all the skins she needs eventually.


Also, Blood Moon skins have nothing to do with the moon as they are based on Japanese Kabuki.
Yup, fire-themed skin will be coming later this year, so she does have something in the works!
Define "later."
We generally don't give ETAs on skins.

Fair enough. Can we get some context on far along the team is and/or any obstacles in making the skin?

I know a lot of Diana players that would like to literally burn the competition.
She's in the concept phase right now. She was never intended to be released immediately after All-Stars.

Ok, that makes a lot more sense. Thanks for the info, Katey!

Also, I know I shouldn't be asking this... but would you guys consider releasing a humorous skin for Shen this April? Like Shenpai?

Of course, glad to help! ^-^ 

It wouldn't have to be just for April Fools, we do silly skins throughout the year. We could definitely consider something a bit less serious for him.
So is Shenpai a possible reality?!? Pleaaaaase?
Ehhh, I don't know about that one. :P Maybe?
you could use a lot of naruto themes on it too. Use Kakashi as inspiration since they both wear face masks. :D
:D the troll level is over 9000 :P

Good enough for me. Katey, I'll be expecting my Shenpai skin for April Fool's.

Consider it my birthday present. :P

(Don't freak out if the team decides on Banana Shen or something, any skin will do nicely)
I mean, the new summoner icons are kind of sketchy though. One is Kennen mask, one is Yasuo mask, and then the other one is Diana's symbol on her head...sooooooooo

Diana's symbol goes the other direction, plus the "dot" area is bigger on her... so I dunno bout that.

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Diana_0.jpg

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EF0H74TS_F0/VrpDrOUY-5I/AAAAAAAA308/SywP1S8CFUw/s1600/profileIcon1109.png
It's a Blood Moon Seal.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UAVoA1rA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-02-09T20:46:16.154+0000)
>
> Diana's symbol goes the other direction, plus the "dot" area is bigger on her... so I dunno bout that.

Yes it does go the other direction, but it is a blood moon, so maybe it's spiced up a bit. Plus, actual size on a summoner icon would probably look odd.

> She fights for the moon, so ya know, it would kinda make sense.

I'm holding out for Star Guardian Diana.
Mount targon event soon?
just because she isn't getting one this year doesn't mean she's never getting one. it's kind of a yearly event.
